#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef pair<int, int> PII;
const int MAXN = 1000 + 10, M = 982451653;
int G[MAXN][MAXN];
char s[MAXN];

void run() {
  scanf("%s", s);
  int r = 0;
  for (int i = 0; s[i]; ++i) {
    r = (10ll * r + s[i] - '0') % M;
  }
  vector<PII> ret;
  for (int i = 1; i <= 1000; ++i) {
    for (int j = 1; j <= 1000; ++j) {
      if (G[i][j] == r) ret.push_back(PII(i, j));
    }
  }
  if (ret.empty()) puts("The Grid is Too Big!");
  else {
    printf("%d\n", (int)ret.size());
    for (auto &x: ret) printf("%d %d\n", x.first, x.second);
  }
}

int main() {
  G[1][1] = 1;
  for (int i = 1; i <= 1000; ++i) {
    for (int j = 1; j <= 1000; ++j) {
      if (i == 1 && j == 1) continue;
      G[i][j] = G[i][j - 1] + G[i - 1][j];
      if (G[i][j] >= M) G[i][j] -= M;
    }
  }
  int T; scanf("%d", &T);
  for (int i = 0; i < T; ++i) {
    run();
  }
  return 0;
}
